item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An Unreachable Hidden XKCD Easter Egg inside CPython (17 points | 6 comments)

8. How Many Values Does a Boolean Have? (2020) (12 points | 10 comments)

10. Threads Beat Async/Await (37 points | 41 comments)

14. Build your own SQLite in Rust, Part 3: SQL parsing 101 (12 points | 1 comment)
15. httpd.rocks - Setup an HTTPS-enabled web-server with httpd on OpenBSD (22 points | 2 comments)

18. Released ESLint Plugin Perfectionist v4.0.0 (1 points | no comments)

20. How a BBC navigation bar component broke depending on which external monitor it was on (9 points | no comments)
21. The Netflix Simian Army (2 points | no comments)
22. ChatGPT is Slipping (36 points | 12 comments)
23. n times faster than C, Arm edition (33 points | 7 comments)
24. Obtaining statistical properties through modeling and simulation (1 points | no comments)
25. The Prequel to SQL is SEQUEL (1 points | no comments)
